    • Method Detail

      • addMessage

        public boolean addMessage(java.lang.String login,
                          java.lang.String theme,
                          java.lang.String message,
                          int creatorId,
                          boolean forAdmin,
                          AccountDAO accountDAO)
                   throws DAOException
        Adds new message in database.
        Parameters:
        login - addressee
        theme - theme of the message
        message - body of the message
        creatorId - account id of creator of the message
        forAdmin - true, if the message is for administrators
        accountDAO - AccountDAO object
        Returns:
        true if everything is successful
        Throws:
        DAOException - signals, that statement was not executed successfully

        accountId - account id of addressee
        Returns:
